alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Arizona, including the following county, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 715 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 454 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms is ongoing. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
